cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: A son who bears no guilt, his mother has not borne him on any day
(The concept) has never been expressed (Akk. it is unknown), (armed/working) people having no guilt has not been since ancient times
Time elapses with the one who continually passes by
Utu shines on (lit. with) the one who continually jumps/dances
The youth, the “I want to surpass” (Akk I want to make ... surpassing) ... has given moonlight(?)
